about.title: About Police Assistant
about.description: Police Assistant is an AI-powered chatbot designed specifically for law enforcement personnel. It provides instant access to legal sections, departmental forms, and Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) in multiple languages. The assistant helps officers quickly find relevant information, improving efficiency and ensuring accurate legal references.
